title: rawkv: integration test case `test_raw_put_key_guard` is flaky
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

master (https://github.com/tikv/tikv/commit/8484ececb571a28094f3d316fcb6b71f7b2ff12e)

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->
N/A

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

Run CI in PR.

### What did you expect?

CI succeed.

### What did happened?

CI failed:
![img_v2_8afad2c9-6838-406a-b653-1f986529271g](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1907938/216874824-2bb972e1-4f15-4bcf-ac80-fc6d001a0a19.jpg)
